SubscriptionBoxesMod.Introduction.Letter: Hello @,^^We are More From Mail, a company dedicated to enhance your mail experience.^^We are writing to offer you our Subscription Boxes Service. Based on your interests, we will send you a curated selection to enrich your daily life.^Choose one of our packs: The Forager's Pack, The Miner's Pack, and The Adventurer's Pack.^^Write back to us with your choice, and we’ll send you a catalog with the available tiers.^^ - MFM
SubscriptionBoxesMod.Recurrency.Letter: Hello @,^^More From Mail here again to enhance your mail experience with our Subscription Boxes Service.^Based on your interests, we will send you a curated selection to enrich your daily life.^Choose one of our packs: The Forager's Pack, The Miner's Pack, and The Adventurer's Pack.^Write back to us with your choice, and we’ll send you a catalog with the available tiers.^ - MFM
SubscriptionBoxesMod.ForagerBoxCatalog.L: MFM Subscription Boxes Forager's Pack Catalog

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^The Forager's Pack has 5 categories of items:^Mushroom, Warp Totem, Tree Item, Tree Seed, and Cooking.^Catalog Tier Options:^ -Standard(500g): 1 item from each category.^ -Deluxe(1000g): 2 items from each category.^ -Premium(1500g): 3 items from each category.^Bonus: A Cookout Kit or a Tent Kit.^^Send payment through the mail once you made your choice.^Packs arrive on Fridays.^ - MFM
SubscriptionBoxesMod.MinerBoxCatalog.Let: MFM Subscription Boxes Miner's Pack Catalog

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^The Miner's Pack has 5 categories of items:^Ore, Resource, Foraged Mineral, Gem, and Cooking.^Each tier comes with a given number of items of each category, plus a given stack of a random type of geode.^Catalog Tier Options:^ -Standard(500g): 1 from each category, 1 geode.^ -Deluxe(1000g): 2 from each category, 3 geodes.^ -Premium(1500g): 3 from each category, 5 geodes.^^Send payment through the mail once you made your choice.^Packs arrive on Fridays.^ - MFM
SubscriptionBoxesMod.AdventurerBoxCatalo: MFM Subscription Boxes Adventurer's Pack Catalog

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^The Adventurer's Pack always comes with one staircase, one type of explosive with the stack inscresing with each tier, plus a selection of item from a number of categories that get more specific with each tier.^Catalog Tier Options:^ -Standard(500g): 1 weapon, 1 wearable, 1 explosive, 1 food, 1 staircase^ -Deluxe(1000g): 1 sword, 1 club/dagger, 1 ring, 1 footwear, 1 explosive, 1 cooking, 1 drink, 1 staircase^ -Premium(1500g): 1 sword, 1 club, 1 dagger, 2 rings, 1 footwear, 1 explosive, 2 cookings, 1 drink, 1 staircase^^Send payment through the mail once you made your choice.^Packs arrive on Fridays.^ - MFM
SubscriptionBoxesMod.ForagerDelivery.Let: MFM Subscription Boxes Forager's Pack Delivery

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^Thank you for choosing our service.^We hope you enjoy the items we have selected for you in this Forager's Pack.^^You can write back to us with your preferences for next week now, or wait for a reminder next week.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.MinerDelivery.Lette: MFM Subscription Boxes Miner's Pack Delivery

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^Thank you for choosing our service.^We hope you enjoy the items we have selected for you in this Miner's Pack.^^You can write back to us with your preferences for next week now, or wait for a reminder next week.
MFM Subscription Boxes Adventurer's Pack Delivery

* MFM Subscription Boxes *^Thank you for choosing our service.^We hope you enjoy the items we have selected for you in this Adventurer's Pack.^^You can write back to us with your preferences for next week now, or wait for a reminder next week.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxType.Question: Write back choosing which pack?
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxType.Miner.Respo: You wrote back saying you chose the Miner's Pack
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxType.Forager.Res: You wrote back saying you chose the Forager's Pack
You wrote back saying you chose the Adventurer's Pack
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxType.Skip.Respon: You wrote back saying you are going to skip this week.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxTier.Question: Write back choosing which pack?
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxTier.Standard.Re: You wrote back sending payment for the Standard Pack
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxTier.Deluxe.Resp: You wrote back sending payment for the Deluxe Pack
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxTier.Premium.Res: You wrote back sending payment for the Premium Pack
SubscriptionBoxesMod.BoxTier.Later.Respo: You left the letter in the mailbox to decide tomorrow.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.Delivery.Question: Write back now?
SubscriptionBoxesMod.Delivery.Keep: Keep the same pack and tier.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.Delivery.Keep.Respo: You wrote back sending payment for the same pack and tier.
SubscriptionBoxesMod.Delivery.Later.Resp: You will wait for a new letter next week.
